listitem.para: This document specifies requirements for implementations of the VSIPL++ Library suitable for a multi-processor environment.
This document “VSIPL++ Parallel Specification (1.2)” is part of the VSIPL++ Specification and is incorporated via reference into the “VSIPL++ Specification (1.2)”.
[Note: This document and the other VSIPL++ specification documents use the same clause notation even though the clause and sub-clause numbers may differ. ]
